mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction (tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date, sold_price, amount) VALUES(seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo:NUMERIC}, #{buyer.userId:VARCHAR}, #{paymentOption:CHAR}, #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{divyRequest:VARCHAR}, 2, SYSDATE, #{divyDate:DATE}, #{soldPrice:NUMERIC}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT t.tran_no, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_data, t.dlvy_date, t.sold_price, t.amount, p.prod_name, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.quantity, p.stock, p.price, p.image_file, p.reg_date AS prodreg, u.user_name, u.password, u.role, u.ssn, u.cell_phone, u.addr, u.email, u.reg_date AS ureg FROM transaction t LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON t.prod_no = p.prod_no LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id WHERE t.tran_no = #{_parameter} AND t.deleted IS NULL

SELECT t.tran_no, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_data, t.dlvy_date, t.sold_price, t.amount, p.prod_name, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.quantity, p.stock, p.price, p.image_file, p.reg_date AS prodreg, u.user_name, u.password, u.role, u.ssn, u.cell_phone, u.addr, u.email, u.reg_date AS ureg FROM transaction t LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON t.prod_no = p.prod_no LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id WHERE t.prod_no = #{_parameter} AND t.deleted IS NULL

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date, amount FROM transaction WHERE deleted IS NULL
AND buyer_id = #{userId}
AND tran_status_code = '2 '
AND tran_status_code = '3 '
AND tran_status_code = '4 ' ) countTable
